component.name: NES30 Pro
component.summary: Firmware for the 8Bitdo NES30 Pro Game Controller

description.p: Updating the firmware on your NES30 Pro device improves performance and adds new features.
This stable release fixes the following issues:

ul.li: Disable auto-sleep when the device is connected to a USB port
Improve performance of the analog sticks
Add support for Joystick Mode to OS X

screenshot.caption: Unplug the controller, hold down POWER+PAIRING until the yellow LED is flashing then reconnect the controller.
